name: Boat Sim 2 (Ships)
description:
Boat Sim 2 (Ships) puts you at the controls of a large Icebreaker (cruise ship will be added in next update), out in the ocean in heavy seas.

Carefully weather the stormy weather as you hear the ocean sounds around you, view the land in the distance.

Watch other large ships ride the waves, go up close and BLAST your ships horn !

Navigate to the dock or sail along the coastline, or take your ship out to sea.

Unlike games, this ship simulation has no time limits or objectives, be the skipper anytime you want, for as long as you want.

Building on the original Boat Sim which enabled users to sail round scenic islands in a speed boat and fishing boat, this takes it to a new level with heavy seas and ships.

NEXT UPDATE

ALL additional ships and scenery areas are included, buy once get additional ships as released.

A start menu will be added as requested to select starting position and ship to board.

CAMERA ANGLES

Multiple camera angles let you view your ship from the front, top, side and aft, as well as 2 external views.

CONTROLS

Easy to use controls, control your ship with the throttle lever, right joystick controls rudder (left / right) and top half of screen controls view.

So what are you waiting for Skipper, time to ride the waves and steer your ship through the storm !

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT

Please post ideas, feedback and requests for support on our forum (support link), this is v1.3, we look forward to hearing from you to keep improving the app.
